tagline: a resizable and scrollable contacts widget for Android 4.1+ devices
body:
### Introduction.
Welcome to visit the project site of the Resizable Contacts Widget.

### Installation
Grab the latest version of either the [Free](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gmail.yuyang226.contactswidget) or the [Paid](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gmail.yuyang226.contactswidget.pro) version from the Google Play Store.

![Promotional Image](http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8198/8207641911_858718a709_o.png)
name: Resizable Contacts Widgets
